`,(0,i.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,i.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-typescript",children:`import { defineDocumentType, makeSource } from 'contentlayer/source-files';

export const Post = defineDocumentType(() => ({
  name: 'Post',
  filePathPattern: \`blog/**/*.mdx\`,
  contentType: 'mdx',
  fields: {
    title: { type: 'string', required: true },
    date: { type: 'date', required: true },
    description: { type: 'string' },
    published: { type: 'boolean', required: true },
    image: { type: 'string', required: true },
  },
  computedFields: {
    slug: {
      type: 'string',
      resolve: (doc) => \`/\${doc._raw.flattenedPath}\`,
    },
  },
}));
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-dbece7b9-33a5-4c9e-8b94-36a9ebed37b4.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/kimurachihiro/Desktop/dev/post-writer-webapp/content/blog/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-dbece7b9-33a5-4c9e-8b94-36a9ebed37b4.mdx",lineNumber:41,columnNumber:1},this),`
